```{python}
tile_id_waste = waste['tile_id']
tile_id_non_waste = non_waste['tile_id']
```


```{python}
# base_path_prefix
base_path_prefix = "690585b76415e43597ffd7eb_complete_"

# tile_id_wasteの各値を連結してファイルパスを作成
file_paths = [f"{base_path_prefix}{tile_id}.tif" for tile_id in tile_id_waste]
```

```{python}
src_dir = "/Users/ito_hiroki/05.Lecture/GeoAI/GeoAI/data/Freetown_tiles_5m"
dst_dir = "/Users/ito_hiroki/05.Lecture/GeoAI/GeoAI/data/waste"

os.makedirs(dst_dir, exist_ok=True)
```


```{python}
for file_path in file_paths:
	src_path = os.path.join(src_dir, os.path.basename(file_path))
	dst_path = os.path.join(dst_dir, os.path.basename(file_path))
	if os.path.exists(src_path):
		shutil.copy2(src_path, dst_path)
	else:
		print(f"Not found: {src_path}")
```
